pageProduct.name: Wellgrove Immune Support Olive Leaf Extract 120 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Wellgrove Immune Support olive leaf extract is a natural, preservative free alternative for immune health and supports your overall and wellbeing. Traditionally used in herbal medicine (western) to help relieve symptoms of cold and flu and support your body's natural defences.

Warnings

Please consult a healthcare professional before use if: diagnosed medical conditions; taking any other medications, pregnant or breastfeeding; under 6 years. Consult your healthcare professional if symptoms persist. Keep out of reach of children.

Common Uses

IMMUNE SUPPORT Traditionally used in herbal medicine (western) to help support a healthy immune system, relieve symptoms of cold and flu and support your body's natural defences.
GENERAL HEALTH & WELLBEING Provides antioxidants to reduce free radical damage and oxidative stress in the body. Helps promote general health and wellbeing when used as part of a healthy lifestyle.

Ingredients

olefresh Olea europaea (Olive) leaf extract.

Directions

Adults (Children 12+ years & Adults): 2 capsules daily.
^or, as professionally recommended 
Children 6 to 12 years (20kg-40kg):  1 capsule daily * Children's dose rates based on herbal dosing principles Best consumed with food.
